abstract: Trade-in to mfrs of material for resale to Allies: Sen Pepper suggests it to Roosevelt for older army and navy planes; plan backed by Repr May

headline.main: PLANE 'TRADE-IN' URGED; Pepper Suggests Plan to Send Allies Old Craft, It Is Said

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 2 (AP)--President Roosevelt was reported reliably today to have before him a proposal that the Administration authorize the Army and Navy to ... "trade in" some of their older war planes to manufacturers who in turn could sell them to the Allies for immediate delivery.
